# tf.test.main

Runs all unit tests.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.test.main`
* `tf.compat.v2.test.main`
* `tf.test.main`

``` python
tf.test.main(argv=None)
```



Defined in [`python/platform/test.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/python/platform/test.py).
